q1: how far has Mexico reached in the world cup?
a1: In the last one they reached the second round
q2: Mexico had a good World Cup after defeating Germany
a2: Well, that was a special game
q3: Mexico have some good attacking players, what is lacking but?
a3: They need a better defensive side.
q4: Does being lower on a scale of average height hurt them in terms of defenders?
a4: Maybe in aerial defense but at the end of day its all about heart.
